title: Bug 117981: Unable to select items in library outline view on first attempt
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected on the first attempt. Subsequent attempts to select the same item are successful.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view
2. [Please provide additional steps here to reproduce the issue]
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item remains unselected.
EB: The item should be selected when clicking on it in the library outline view on the first attempt.
SR: [Please provide clear and specific steps to reproduce the issue here]
